title: Fantasy
alt: I guess if she accepted irrational realities, she'd hardly be my fantasy.
transcript:
[Cueball sits hugging his knees. From his head there goes three bubbles to a thought bubble.]
Cueball: If only there were some way we could be together.[The comic fades into a thought bubble in shaded gray color. The bubble contains the next four panels.][The thought ends with three bubbles going down to Cueball who is now standing and scratching his head and again the comic is back to the normal black drawing style.]
Cueball:Â ??
